mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS usage_count , SUM(use_time) AS usage_minute , SUM(use_distance) AS usage_meter , round(SUM(use_distance)/1000*0.232, 1) AS carbon_reduction FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt}

SELECT svc.USE_NO AS use_no , svc.USE_DISTANCE AS use_distance , svc.USE_TIME AS use_time , date_format(svc.USE_START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS use_start_dt , date_format(svc.USE_END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS use_end_dt , date_format(pay.PAY_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS pay_datetime , max(case when pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'C' then pay.PAY_COST END) AS card_pay , max(case when pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'P' then pay.PAY_COST END) AS point_pay FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use_pay as pay , kickboard_svc.t_svc_use AS svc WHERE 1=1 AND svc.USE_NO = pay.USE_NO AND svc.USER_NO =#{user_no} AND DATE(svc.use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt} GROUP BY svc.USE_NO ORDER BY use_start_dt DESC
